name: 李俊賢
objective: Teaching Topics: Delta HMI, Delta PLC, ladder diagrams, sequential function charts, Delta AC servo motors and drives, integrated applications, case studies, and special topics.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Delta HMI: Hardware and IDE
Week 3: Delta HMI: Internal Memory and Display
Week 4: Delta HMI: Macros
Week 5: Delta HMI: Applications
Week 6: Delta HMI: Animation
Week 7: Delta PLC: Hardware and IDE
Week 8: Delta PLC: Ladder Diagrams (LD)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Delta PLC: LD Applications
Week 11: HMI+PLC: Animation
Week 12: Delta PLC: Sequential Function Charts (SFC)
Week 13: Delta PLC: SFC Applications
Week 14: Delta PLC: LD + SFC Applications
Week 15: Delta PLC: Step Ladder Applications
Week 16: Delta AC Servo Motors and Drives (ASDA)
Week 17: Delta ASDA Applications
Week 18: Final Exam
materials:
1)　　曾百由，自動化控制元件設計與應用：台達PLC/HMI/SERVO應用開發，五南出版社、2016。
2)　　Delta Electronics, Operation and Application Manuals. [Online]. Available: https://downloadcenter.deltaww.com/
